sense.gloss: performance (as opposed to practice), going before an audience or on-air, take
high of the season, height (of summer, etc.), actual event (or celebration, etc.), real deal
penetrative vaginal sex (with a prostitute), unsimulated sex (in an adult movie)

sdata.j: ↑咳↑↓せき↓↑止↑↓ど↓めシロップ。|↑本番|↑↓ほんばん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑一↑↓いち↓↑口↑↓くち↓↑飲↑↓の↓まないと↑落↑↓お↓ち↑着↑↓つ↓かない！
sdata.e: Cough syrup. If I don't drink a mouthful before going on stage I can't settle down!

sdata.j: リハーサルなしでのぶっつけ|↑本番|↑↓ほんばん↓の↑演奏↑↓えんそう↓だったため、あまり↑上手↑↓うま↓い↑出来↑↓でき↓とは↑言↑↓い↓えなかった。
sdata.e: Because I did the performance without any preparation whatsoever, I can't say it was good.

sdata.j: |↑本番|↑↓ほんばん↓は、↑緊張↑↓きんちょう↓して↑足↑↓あし↓がガタガタ↑震↑↓ふる↓えてました。
sdata.e: During the performance, I was so nervous that my legs were shaking.

sdata.j: 「あっ、↑時間↑↓じかん↓ないし。やけっぱちよ。ぶっつけ|↑本番|↑↓ほんばん↓でいこう。↑明日↑↓あした↓、がんばろう。もう、どうにでもなれってんだ」「どうしたの？」「↑明日↑↓あした↓、ゼミのプレゼンがあるの。↑資料↑↓しりょう↓が↑今↑↓いま↓できたんだけど、まだ↑一↑↓いち↓↑度↑↓ど↓も↑通↑↓とお↓してやってないの。どうしよう」「どうにもならないね」
sdata.e: Oh no, there's not enough time. This is hopeless, I'm just gonna wing it and try my best tomorrow, I don't care anymore. "What's the problem?" "I have an in-class presentation tomorrow, and I have all the materials ready, but I haven't gone over them yet. I've really messed up this time." "Well, no help for it."
